td.content: s:25 year old f presents with Liver for more than 7 days. she is a heavy drinker she states she has never smoked a cigarette in her life o:Height 66 in, Weight 143 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 86, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 18, HCV RIBA positive, Comprehensive Metabolic Panel ALT=120 U/L,AST=100 U/L,total bilirubin=5.2 mg/dL, Direct Bilirubin direct bilirubin=0.4 mg/dL a:Hepatitis C p:administered Interferon alfacon 1 - 9 mcg subcutaneous 3 x week x 6 months, performed HCV RIBA, Comprehensive Metabolic Panel, Direct Bilirubin, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

td.content: s:a 25 year old F writer with Liver. she has had several such episodes over past 15 months. o:Height 66 in, Weight 142 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 70, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 18 a:Hepatitis C p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to internal medicine.

s:25 YO white female writer reports Liver from time to time. she drinks at least 4 beers a day she denies smoking o:Height 66 in, Weight 141 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 70, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 18 a:Hepatitis C p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed ROFERON-A - 9 MM UNITS/0.5ML subcutaneously 3 x week for up to 12 months.
